A customizable matchbox with a digital display that changes color based on the type of match inside. This allows users to easily identify which matches are which, making it easier to find the right one.
A matchbox with a built-in magnifying glass for reading small labels or instructions.
A matchbox with a built-in flashlight for finding matches in the dark.
A matchbox with a built-in fire starter, such as a magnesium striker or a windproof lighter.
A matchbox with a built-in compass for navigating in the wilderness.
